channel.title: Apocalypse Keys Season 3 [PLAYTEST]
channel.description:
![64b21cec3a181e1cd7e00f2264b860c2|337x499](upload://io6INqaSKTCeOsOoBL4YeGqiSqz.jpeg)
**((We have an empty seat session 5-8! Also as a reminder, I'll be drawing on the wait list if someone can't make it to a session.}}**
**This series is the third season of an ongoing game, but we will be pulling from the wait list if a player is unable to make it!** You do not need to be familiar with the game system or story so far to jump right in, we'll take good care of you! I will email everyone on the RSVP list to confirm attendance. In case someone needs to drop, I will reach out to folks on the wait list!
***The Apocalypse is coming, and humanity is desperate. We need monsters to defeat monsters. We are those monsters.***
***To unlock the Doors to the Apocalypse, we must gather enough Keys: of knowledge, wisdom, secrets.***
***This is a story of mystery, found family, of monsters that are heroes.***
Apocalypse Keys is a *Powered by the Apocalypse* game. Instead of stats, players have ways of gaining tokens of Darkness by hitting certain emotional beats. But the monsters must try to control themselves, it is too easy to go too far as a monster, inching your way towards becoming a harbinger of the apocalypse...
**Touchstones:** Mostly Hellboy (both the comics and movies), touched of Supernatural (the tv series) and Hellsing (the anime). Strong Urban Fantasy elements that focus on supernatural horror and mystery.
**Content Warning** : This is a game that focuses on horror, the supernatural, emotional relationships, and romance.
**System** : [Apocalypse Keys](https://temporalhiccup.itch.io/apocalypse-keys) (Powered by the Apocalypse)
**Duration** : Eight 3 hour sessions
**Breaks** : 2 breaks per session (5-10 mins)
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : Yes, but only if all players consent to recording and publishing
**Attendance** : Joining all eight sessions is ideal but not required
**Safety** : Lines & Veils, Script Change, an open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.
**Open access** : Public signs up are available at 9/28/2020 at 10PM (Manila Time)
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gauntlet-rpg.com%2Fcommunity-code-of-conduct.html&v=3).
**Session 1** : [date=2020-10-06 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3eNRE5TY0Tvopre9d
**Session 2** : [date=2020-10-13 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3eaHsEKC3rXnaD4KC
**Session 3** : [date=2020-10-20 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3emF5238V3u99BJzh
**Session 4** : [date=2020-10-27 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3f-FvAm4mPSeHe2OH
**Session 5** : [date=2020-11-03 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3feaAsI8vlEULkUY9
**Session 6** : [date=2020-11-10 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3ft_Y0O4jYSbb0Y6A
**Session 7** : [date=2020-11-17 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3g0GsbtlXud-d7bk1
**Session 8** : [date=2020-11-24 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MI3gAoTMhcxcGFq69CI

item.title: Apocalypse Keys Season 3 [PLAYTEST]
item.dc:creator: @swordqueen
item.description:
@swordqueen wrote:

((We have an empty seat session 5-8! Also as a reminder, I’ll be drawing on the wait list if someone can’t make it to a session.}}

This series is the third season of an ongoing game, but we will be pulling from the wait list if a player is unable to make it! You do not need to be familiar with the game system or story so far to jump right in, we’ll take good care of you! I will email everyone on the RSVP list to confirm attendance. In case someone needs to drop, I will reach out to folks on the wait list!

The Apocalypse is coming, and humanity is desperate. We need monsters to defeat monsters. We are those monsters.

To unlock the Doors to the Apocalypse, we must gather enough Keys: of knowledge, wisdom, secrets.

This is a story of mystery, found family, of monsters that are heroes.

Apocalypse Keys is a Powered by the Apocalypse game. Instead of stats, players have ways of gaining tokens of Darkness by hitting certain emotional beats. But the monsters must try to control themselves, it is too easy to go too far as a monster, inching your way towards becoming a harbinger of the apocalypse…

Touchstones: Mostly Hellboy (both the comics and movies), touched of Supernatural (the tv series) and Hellsing (the anime). Strong Urban Fantasy elements that focus on supernatural horror and mystery.

Content Warning : This is a game that focuses on horror, the supernatural, emotional relationships, and romance.

System : Apocalypse Keys (Powered by the Apocalypse)
